vernac_cmds: Definition size_compatible {C: compspecs} t p := match p with | Vptr b i_ofs => Ptrofs.unsigned i_ofs + sizeof t < Ptrofs.modulus | _ => True end.

Lemma nonlock_permission_bytes_valid_pointer: forall sh b ofs n i, 0 <= ofs /\ ofs + n <= Ptrofs.modulus -> 0 <= i < n -> nonidentity sh -> nonlock_permission_bytes sh (b, ofs) n |-- valid_pointer (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr (ofs + i))).
destruct (w @ (b, ofs + i)); inv H2; inv H4; auto.
Lemma VALspec_range_valid_pointer: forall sh b ofs n i, 0 <= ofs /\ ofs + n <= Ptrofs.modulus -> 0 <= i < n -> VALspec_range n sh (b, ofs) |-- valid_pointer (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr (ofs + i))).

Lemma address_mapsto_valid_pointer: forall ch v sh b ofs i, 0 <= ofs /\ ofs + size_chunk ch <= Ptrofs.modulus -> 0 <= i < size_chunk ch -> address_mapsto ch v sh (b, ofs) |-- valid_pointer (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr (ofs + i))).
Lemma mapsto_valid_pointer: forall {cs: compspecs} sh t p v i, size_compatible t p -> 0 <= i < sizeof t -> nonidentity sh -> mapsto sh t p v |-- valid_pointer (offset_val i p).
erewrite size_chunk_sizeof in H by eauto.
erewrite size_chunk_sizeof in H0 by eauto.
erewrite size_chunk_sizeof in H by eauto.
erewrite size_chunk_sizeof in H0 by eauto.
erewrite size_chunk_sizeof in H by eauto.
erewrite size_chunk_sizeof in H0 by eauto.
Lemma memory_block_valid_pointer: forall {cs: compspecs} sh n p i, 0 <= i < n -> nonidentity sh -> memory_block sh n p |-- valid_pointer (offset_val i p).

Lemma VALspec_range_weak_valid_pointer: forall sh b ofs n i, 0 <= ofs /\ ofs + n < Ptrofs.modulus -> 0 <= i <= n -> 0 < n -> VALspec_range n sh (b, ofs) |-- weak_valid_pointer (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr (ofs + i))).
assert (0 <= i < n \/ i = n) by omega.
replace (ofs + n + -1) with (ofs + n - 1) by omega.

Lemma nonlock_permission_bytes_weak_valid_pointer: forall sh b ofs n i, 0 <= ofs /\ ofs + n < Ptrofs.modulus -> 0 <= i <= n -> 0 < n -> nonidentity sh -> nonlock_permission_bytes sh (b, ofs) n |-- weak_valid_pointer (Vptr b (Ptrofs.repr (ofs + i))).
assert (0 <= i < n \/ i = n) by omega.
destruct (w @ (b, ofs + i)); inv H3; auto.
replace (ofs + n + -1) with (ofs + n - 1) by omega.
destruct (w @ (b, ofs + n - 1)); inv H3; auto.
Lemma memory_block_weak_valid_pointer: forall {cs: compspecs} sh n p i, 0 <= i <= n -> 0 < n -> nonidentity sh -> memory_block sh n p |-- weak_valid_pointer (offset_val i p).

command: destruct (w @ (b, ofs + i)); inv H2; inv H4; auto.
assert (0 <= i < n \/ i = n) by omega.
replace (ofs + n + -1) with (ofs + n - 1) by omega.
assert (0 <= i < n \/ i = n) by omega.
destruct (w @ (b, ofs + i)); inv H3; auto.
replace (ofs + n + -1) with (ofs + n - 1) by omega.
destruct (w @ (b, ofs + n - 1)); inv H3; auto.
